title: ECE in electronic city campus
content: I got a 20,000 rank in KCET, a 15,000 rank in COMEDK, and a 4,000 rank in PESSAT. People have told me that I can get into ECE at Electronic City Campus in the second round. The question is, should I take it?

comments.body: Kcet no chance , there is no entry through comedk for pes and during last time 2nd round there were barely any seats left most of them were sold , some 3 digit rankers had to settle for ECE in ec campus
Last year cutoff was 12k around for ece at electronic city campus
